title: Strengthening Healthcare Competencies: Mobile-Based Computer-Assisted Mathematics Education: Mastering Fraction Concepts

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary-level basic mathematical concepts (addition, subtraction, multiplication, division)
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can understand the concept of fractions and apply them with over 80% accuracy in real-life and workplace scenarios.
After three or more repetitions of CAI (Computer-Assisted Instruction) content delivered via smartphones, learners can independently solve fraction operation problems with over 70% accuracy.
Learners can demonstrate over 60% positive perception toward mathematics learning using CAI tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
